title: A bill to provide better Federal interagency coordination and support for emergency medical services.
content: Emergency Medical Services Support Act - Establishes a Federal Interagency Committee on Emergency Medical Services to provide intergovernmental coordination of emergency medical services. Requires the Committee to: (1) identify community-based emergency medical services' needs, (2) make grant program and streamlining recommendations. And (3) set priorities. Establishes a Federal Interagency Committee on Emergency Medical Services Advisory Council. Requires the Committee and the Council to each report annually to Congress on the state of community-abased emergency medical services, including recommendations.
